noun.description: An armed police officer in France and other French-speaking countries.
examples: he was hauled off by a gendarme to the police station

noun.description: A rock pinnacle on a mountain, occupying and blocking an arête.
examples: the granite pillars and gendarmes kept the sun from warming us

origin: Mid 16th century (originally denoting a mounted officer in the French army): French, from gens d'armes men of arms. gendarme (sense 1) dates from the late 18th century.
